email_chain.subject: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

I hope you're doing well. We have an opportunity to ship 150,000 MT of iron ore from Tubarão to Qingdao. The vessel PACIFIC TRADER is available with a laycan of April 10-15. The starting freight quote is USD 25.50 per metric ton on CIF terms.

Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Jane Doe
Maritime Brokers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Jane,

Thanks for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Could you provide more details on the vessel's DWT and LOA? Also, is there any flexibility in the laycan?

Best,
John Smith
Cargo Charterers Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

The PACIFIC TRADER has a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 290 meters. The laycan is somewhat flexible, and we can push it to April 12-17 if needed. Regarding the rate, we can consider a slight adjustment if you can confirm the cargo size and laycan soon.

Best regards,
Jane

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Jane,

Thanks for the details. We can confirm the cargo size of 150,000 MT. If you can adjust the laycan to April 12-17 and reduce the rate to USD 24.00 per metric ton, we are ready to proceed.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

We can agree to the adjusted laycan of April 12-17. However, the best rate we can offer is USD 24.50 per metric ton. This is already below the market average, and the vessel is in excellent condition.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Jane

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Jane,

USD 24.50 works for us. Please proceed with the contract and confirm the laycan and stem details.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Great! We will finalize the contract with the laycan of April 12-17 and the rate of USD 24.50 per metric ton. The stem will be ready by April 10.

Looking forward to a smooth operation.

Best regards,
Jane
